eventDecorators.name: AddCaller
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a router is disapproved for Portal.

eventDecorators.name: MoveCoin
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a router is disapproved for Portal.

parameterDecorators.name: caller
parameterDecorators.description: - The account that called the function.

parameterDecorators.name: router
parameterDecorators.description: - The address of the disapproved router.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.
